Author: Istanbullsh1t
Text: Thank you so much man and I’m so sorry that you’re going through the same shit but I am glad that the rest of your life is going awesome. I’m rooting for both of us. We can do this shit. I just can’t figure out how. Once I get the formula then I’m there man. We got this!

Author: merrymaack
Text: I literally JUST posted something similar and holy shit I’m in such a similar boat. I’m at a really good place in my life and all these cool things are happening but I can’t let myself be happy bc I’m wrapped up (alone) in this DUMB ED. I know you need an IRL support system, and god knows I do too, but I’m rooting for you dude. We deserve to recover. I hope you can find someone to open up to, mom or friend or therapist or whatever. Just saying words out loud will take a lot of pressure off. Good luck ❤️
